mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total FROM noticeBoard
SELECT *, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM noticeReply nr WHERE nr.notice_id = nb.notice_id ) FROM noticeBoard nb ORDER BY nb.notice_id DESC LIMIT 20 OFFSET #{notice_page}
SELECT * FROM noticeBoard WHERE title LIKE CONCAT("%", #{value} ,"%") ORDER BY notice_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO noticeBoard (title, content, login_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{login_id})
INSERT INTO noticeReply (reply_id, login_id, content) VALUES (#{reply_id}, #{login_id}, #{content})
